testsuite.name: org.katabank.operations.OperationsTest

testcase.name: when depot a positive amount, then the balance shall increase and add a new line of statement
when depot a 0 amount, then it shall throws a BankException
when withdraw multiple positive amount, then the balance shall decrease and add same number of line of statement
when depot multiple positive amount, then the balance shall increase and add same number of line of statement
when depot a null amount, then it shall throws a BankException
when withdraw a null amount, then it shall throws a BankException
when print a null account, then it shall throws a BankException
when withdraw a positive amount, then the balance shall increase and add a new line of statement
when withdraw a negative amount, then the balance shall increase and add a new line of statement
when withdraw a 0 amount, then it shall throws a BankException
when depot a negative amount, then it shall throws a BankException
